item.author: Mαrψ
item.value:
In TSWW bot ranks are awarded to players to show their specific status, achievements, skills and prizes for special challenges.
⚠️ Read all the information about the ranks at @TsWwRanks.
Your ranks are always shown by /mystate command and by clicking on each rank you can find the description of the it.
*How to Get Ranks* Ranks are given to users only by Task admins or automatically by the bot itself. You can use the /myranks command to view and edit your current ranks. You can also see other players' ranks by replying /myranks on them in a group with TSWW bot.
